// === BOSS HEALTH BAR UI ===
// Objects: BossHealthFrame (Sprite), BossHealthFill (Sprite), Text: UI_BossName (optional)
// Layer: UI. Pin both sprites to the UI so they don't scroll with the world.
// Expect Boss01 has instance variable HP (e.g., 20).

// Init placement (top center)
On start of layout
→ BossHealthFrame: Set position to (ViewportLeft(0) + ViewportWidth(0)/2, ViewportTop(0) + 32)
→ BossHealthFill: Set position to (BossHealthFrame.X - BossHealthFrame.Width/2 + 10, BossHealthFrame.Y)
→ BossHealthFill: Set width to 400
→ BossHealthFrame: Set visible False
→ BossHealthFill: Set visible False

// Show when boss is active
System: Compare global variable BossActive = 1
→ BossHealthFrame: Set visible True
→ BossHealthFill: Set visible True

// Update fill based on Boss01 HP percentage
Every tick
System: Compare global variable BossActive = 1
→ Set local number hp = max(0, Boss01.HP)
→ Set local number pct = clamp(hp / 20.0, 0, 1)   // Adjust denominator if you change boss HP
→ BossHealthFill: Set width to 400 * pct
→ BossHealthFill: Set position to (BossHealthFrame.X - BossHealthFrame.Width/2 + 10 + (400*(pct-1))/2, BossHealthFrame.Y)

// Hide on boss defeat
On destroyed Boss01
→ BossHealthFrame: Set visible False
→ BossHealthFill: Set visible False
→ System: Set BossActive to 0
